instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3662 No display
threads.message: Good day guys , have got an 820-3662 that initially was no power , however I found that it was missing PP3V3_S0 , I traced that to U8030 found it faulty and then replaced it , afterwards, the board powers on , but would neither chime no display , so I tested with another EFI chip just to be sure , but same result , please where can I go from here , am considering replacing the 3 cpu phase mosfets , don?t know if that could result in a no display among it?s known failing issues

threads.title: 820-3662 No display
threads.message:
Do NOT solder refurbirshed "new" FDMF6808 from Cina sellers.
Buy new FDMF6708 from reliable store...

threads.title: 820-3662 No display
threads.message: Thank you, the job has been discontinued
